thread.section_title: HiFX Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HiFX Australia | hifx.com.au
thread.title: Andrew clarke
thread.title_full: HiFX Australia reviewed by Andrew clarke

author: Andrew clarke
title: Andrew clarke
text:
I have dealt with HIFX a few times now and they are always very professional.
It is difficult to contemplate allowing your money to be transferred overseas with thew worry you may not see it again. This has never been an issue with HIFX as the process is emailed to you at every stage which reassures you it is on its way. great interface online also makes the process easy to manage
great service!
